entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 07:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: WNW 25 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23 except minus 30 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23 except minus 30 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
